title: Drawing, "Sketch of John for Project "Faces"", ca. 1974
medium: Brush and blue Ink on tracing paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Profile of John Elsesser, facing left, quickly painted in blue, profile of Trude Guermonprez, originally on the right,  brushed over with strokes of paint.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketch of John for Project "Faces"", ca. 1974.
ca. 1974. Brush and blue Ink on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-106.
